Side Effects: Very tired_ lowered sex drive_ difficulty reaching orgasm_ laziness (stopped running)_ slight weight gain_ vivid dreams
Comments: Really did wonders for my anxiety and depression. Made me feel very happy. My only complaints are regarding the lethargy and sexual side effects. Other than that_ it's been wonderful.

Side Effects: Difficulty orgasm_ low libod_ small weight gain.  Some fogginess and laziness
Comments: Seems to be a slight improvement over the regular Paxil; it's a different salt so it is released differently.  I didn't notice the shocks and the extreme withdrawal when forgetting to take the medicine like Paxil.  Maybe worth a try if you really like Paxil.  Less sedating than CR

Side Effects: Sexual Dysfunction_ occasional fast or irregular heartbeat
Comments: Out of all the anti-depressants I've been on (which is A LOT)_ this has definitely helped me the most.. Im so happy about that too_ I was getting desperate. The only negative thing I have to say about this is the annoying sexual side effects.. Ughh_ I can't orgasm anymore and that's not really helping my depression. Despite all that_ Im still so much better than before. :) As far as helping my anxiety; W o w_ social anxiety is four times better. General anxiety is much more controllable too. I don't think I've had a panic attack in forever. So_ yay!

Side Effects: occassional dizzyiness and/or panic feeling... has subsided over time.
Comments: So far not bad.. only 9 days into it and will update as time goes on (cybercop).
